short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks your LSAT test scores over time. Also helps find explanations for each question.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gives users ability to track and download LSAT preparation test scores over time. Also allows user to automatically look up question explanations.

Simply finish a section to see your results or go to a question and click on the extension to see a question explanation!

Features
- Tracks LSAT questions questions and answers on Law Hub
- "Question Explanation" button for every LSAT question
- Allows user to download their questions and answers
